overview: There’s no business like show business!… And there’s no show like the behind the scenes action of producer Alex Rohmer’s casting couch. It’s a hot and steamy, heels over head competition as some of the sexiest and least inhibited starlets in Hollywood try for the lead in Alex’s screen sizzler. The horny production assistants leave no trick untried in their hunt for the passionately perfect star. Lights! Camera! Scorching, non-stop action!
tagline: Before the show goes on, the clothes must come off!
title: Undressed Rehearsal
